Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $10,001 to $50,000.

Description: Innospec Inc. pleaded guilty to defrauding the United Nations, to violating the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act and to violating the U.S. embargo against Cuba.
